original_text: Behold, the Lord hath a mighty and strong one, which as a tempest of hail and a destroying storm, as a flood of mighty waters overflowing, shall cast down to the earth with the hand.
korean_text: 보라 주께 있는 강하고 힘 있는 자가 쏟아지는 우박 같이, 파괴하는 광풍 같이, 큰 물이 넘침 같이 손으로 그 면류관을 땅에 던지리니

sentences.original_text: Behold, the Lord hath a mighty and strong one,
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 주님께는 강하고 능력 있는 분이 계시며,

sentences.original_text: which as a tempest of hail and a destroying storm,
as a flood of mighty waters overflowing,
shall cast down to the earth with the hand.
